lead_paragraph: The Twins’ center fielder jumped into the stands to check on his mother, who returned to the game after being examined.
snippet: The Twins’ center fielder jumped into the stands to check on his mother, who returned to the game after being examined.

headline.main: Twins’ Span Hits His Mother With a Foul Ball
